title: Dark.Souls.2.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Dark.Souls.2.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


e1a620bed2c4bca36b41.png


Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : FromSoftware, Inc
Publisher : Namco Bandai Games
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Eng
Crack : ALI213


0255c2bdb4975084fc02.png


System requirements:  


Operating System : Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8
Processor : Pentium Core Intel 2 Duo E8500 3.17Ghz or AMD Phenom II X2 555 3.2Ghz
Memory : 2 GB
Video : NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT, ATI Radeon HD 5870
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 17 GB


Game information:  

Continuation of the famous role-playing action again force players to go
through a difficult test. Dark Souls II will offer a new hero, a new history
and a new world. Only one thing consistently - to survive in a bleak universe
of Dark Souls is very difficult.

Countless encounters with terrifying enemies and epic battle with frightful
bosses - the vast Dark Souls II reign of despair and death, and the heroes
waiting only uncompromising never-ending struggle for survival.

No cost Dark Souls II and without a business card series - network mode.
Updated multiplayer displays mechanics indirect interaction of players to
the next level, where the most persistent and strong spirit of waiting for
a worthy reward.

Crown of the Sunken King - plot supplement for the original Dark Souls Ã¢â€žÂ¢ II.
It adds to the game of new enemies and new locations. In the story, the player
learns how the main character goes to a long-lost city, in order to regain the
crown of the king.

Crown of the Old Iron King - this is just another addition to the furious action
/ role-playing game Dark Souls II. It will take you to a huge tower enclosed
by a black fog and hides in its bosom fire, smoke and magic. Will secure the
crown of Old Iron King and walk in the ways that are not what they seem.
Crown of the Ivory King - this is the third and final addition to Dark Souls II.
The action will unfold in an ancient temple surrounded by towering walls and
absorbed gaping emptiness where raging ice storm. You have to fight with the
forces hidden from the eyes, and using the magic of the cold, as well as esoteric abilities.[/ B]


Game Features:  

Death - is not the end: immerse yourself in an exciting game in the vast world
on a new engine with a radically new stunning graphics, sound and special effects.
Maze of monsters and bosses: a dizzying journey into the worlds filled with bizarre
monsters and deadly bosses, which could only come up with the imagination of the
developers "From Software".
Touch attack: a wide range of threats aimed at activation of human fears and phobias:
auditory hallucinations, dizziness, vertigo, etc.
Further and deeper: additional settings allow you to change weapons and armor for
your style of play.
Thoughtful gameplay: Dark Souls Ã¢â€žÂ¢ II - a smooth motion technology "motion capture",
improved fighting system, significantly increased the number of characters, enhanced
self-tuning, new weapons, armor and balanced system of characters.


RePack Features:  

Dark Souls II
Game Version - v1.06
Version calibration - v1.11
Do not cut / recoded
Additions :
Preorder DLCs;
Crown of the Sunken King DLC;
Crown of the Old Iron King DLC;
Crown of the Ivory King DLC
